Consistency determines confidence in intuition

Einhorn 1978, Kahneman 1973.

Q. Why might we be overly confident in our intuitions? A. Baserate neglect and weighing evidence by consistency, rather than validity.

Q. How might we predict the accuracy of intuition? A. Whether feedback is valid, amount of practice and history of learning the environment.
